Massachusetts mayors agree: Abortion. Is. Health care.
 ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌
Read more on ROE ACT

Dear ##SM_RULE_360 Email Salutation##,

The ROE Act has momentum. From Northampton to Newburyport, community leaders are raising their voices to demand full reproductive freedom in Massachusetts.

Attacks on abortion rights are growing nationwide. Massachusetts mayors agree: State lawmakers need to expand and protect access to abortion here in the Bay State. Building on other statewide support, several local mayors have signed a letter in support of the ROE Act.

The ROE act would make abortion not only safe and legal, but affordable and accessible for all people. That's why mayors in every corner of the state are voicing their support for the bill.

We can't let abortion opponents turn back the clock. It's time for Massachusetts to blaze a clear path forward for health care access, women's rights, and reproductive freedom.

As one of the leading voices for reproductive freedom, the ACLU stands firm in our commitment to protecting access to safe, legal abortion. We hope you'll continue to stand with us.

In solidarity,

ACLU of Massachusetts
